attributes.action: Change the law so that any person who opposes our beloved Queen is Deported
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Queen IS what makes our country tick. Anyone who doesn't like her doesn't deserve residence here. I would die for the Queen, would you?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
